description=ESP32 Dev Module
name=esp32-generic
group=ESP32
family=esp32

upload.tool=esptool
upload.maximum_size=1310720
upload.maximum_data_size=327680
upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
upload.speed=${option:UploadSpeed.upload.speed}

serial.disableDTR=true
serial.disableRTS=true

build.mcu=esp32
build.core=esp32
build.variant=esp32
build.board=ESP32_DEV

build.f_cpu=240000000L
build.flash_size=${option:FlashSize.build.flash_size}
build.flash_freq=${option:FlashFreq.build.flash_freq}
build.flash_mode=${option:FlashMode.build.flash_mode}
build.boot=${option:FlashMode.build.flash_boot}
build.partitions=${option:PartitionScheme.build.partitions}
build.defines=

options.PSRAM.name=PSRAM
options.PSRAM.default=disabled
options.PSRAM.disabled.name=Disabled
options.PSRAM.disabled.build.defines=
options.PSRAM.enabled.name=Enabled
options.PSRAM.enabled.build.defines=-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM -mfix-esp32-psram-cache-issue

options.PartitionScheme.name=Partition Scheme
options.PartitionScheme.default=defaultschem
options.PartitionScheme.defaultschem.name=Default
options.PartitionScheme.defaultschem.build.partitions=default
options.PartitionScheme.minimal.name=Minimal (2MB FLASH)
options.PartitionScheme.minimal.build.partitions=minimal
options.PartitionScheme.no_ota.name=No OTA (Large APP)
options.PartitionScheme.no_ota.build.partitions=no_ota
options.PartitionScheme.no_ota.upload.maximum_size=2097152
options.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs.name=Minimal SPIFFS (Large APPS with OTA)
options.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs.build.partitions=min_spiffs
options.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs.upload.maximum_size=1966080

options.FlashMode.name=Flash Mode
options.FlashMode.default=qio
options.FlashMode.qio.name=QIO
options.FlashMode.qio.build.flash_mode=dio
options.FlashMode.qio.build.boot=qio
options.FlashMode.dio.name=DIO
options.FlashMode.dio.build.flash_mode=dio
options.FlashMode.dio.build.boot=dio
options.FlashMode.qout.name=QOUT
options.FlashMode.qout.build.flash_mode=dout
options.FlashMode.qout.build.boot=qout
options.FlashMode.dout.name=DOUT
options.FlashMode.dout.build.flash_mode=dout
options.FlashMode.dout.build.boot=dout

options.FlashFreq.name=Flash Frequency
options.FlashFreq.default=80
options.FlashFreq.80.name=80MHz
options.FlashFreq.80.build.flash_freq=80m
options.FlashFreq.40.name=40MHz
options.FlashFreq.40.build.flash_freq=40m

options.FlashSize.name=Flash Size
options.FlashSize.default=4M
options.FlashSize.4M.name=4MB (32Mb)
options.FlashSize.4M.build.flash_size=4MB
options.FlashSize.2M.name=2MB (16Mb)
options.FlashSize.2M.build.flash_size=2MB
options.FlashSize.2M.build.partitions=minimal

options.UploadSpeed.name=Upload Speed
options.UploadSpeed.default=921600

options.UploadSpeed.921600.name=921600
options.UploadSpeed.921600.upload.speed=921600

options.UploadSpeed.115200.name=115200
options.UploadSpeed.115200.upload.speed=115200

options.UploadSpeed.256000.name=256000
options.UploadSpeed.256000.upload.speed=256000

options.UploadSpeed.230400.upload.speed=230400
options.UploadSpeed.230400.name=230400

options.UploadSpeed.460800.name=460800
options.UploadSpeed.460800.upload.speed=460800

options.UploadSpeed.512000.name=512000
options.UploadSpeed.512000.upload.speed=512000

options.DebugLevel.name=Debug Level
options.DebugLevel.default=none
options.DebugLevel.none.name=None
options.DebugLevel.none.build.code_debug=0
options.DebugLevel.error.name=Error
options.DebugLevel.error.build.code_debug=1
options.DebugLevel.warn.name=Warn
options.DebugLevel.warn.build.code_debug=2
options.DebugLevel.info.name=Info
options.DebugLevel.info.build.code_debug=3
options.DebugLevel.debug.name=Debug
options.DebugLevel.debug.build.code_debug=4
options.DebugLevel.verbose.name=Verbose
options.DebugLevel.verbose.build.code_debug=5
